citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The most recent program review and facility inspection was conducted on October 24, 2022. The regulations require the
IACUC to review the research facility's program for the humane care and use of animals and to inspect the animal
facilities at least once every 6 months. This ensures any issues are identified and addressed in a timely manner.
Correct by: September 29, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.31(c) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
The most recent program review and facility inspection was conducted on October 24, 2022. The regulations require the 
IACUC to review the research facility's program for the humane care and use of animals and to inspect the animal 
facilities at least once every 6 months. This ensures any issues are identified and addressed in a timely manner. 
 
Correct by: September 29, 2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
 n
